item.description:
Cool food, great people, awesome prizes, and learning about education in a developing counrty-sounds like a great way to spend a Sunday afternoon, right?! There is a fundraising event for an education program I work with in South Africa that could really use the support of a great group of nerds!

The event includes a presentation about the program given by the founder, and a photo display of the program and some of the African sights in and around where the students live.  There will also be food and some prizes!

There is a suggested donation, which can be paid at the door. You can also easily pay online by going to the eventbrite site. Which is looking pretty awesome if I do say so myself...so check it out. Please let me know if you have any questions. I would love to have a huge nerd presence there!

http://lettingtheirgreatnessblossom.eventbrite.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Nerd Fun meetup name tags! Let's meet at the registration table by the door at 2pm and I can hand out our special meetup red name tags
item.name: Nerds Supporting Nerds!
